Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 37th overall pick, by Columbus in 1975...
Earned first career win on 4/29/1982...
Injured on 8/17/1983 with a Torn Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Columbus on 2/22/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $4,250,000 per year...
